programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Mia's Prince
programme.desc: Romance novel enthusiast Mia meets Beau, a philanthropist, who is the spitting image of her favorite book hero. As they consider exploring a new romance, Beau's mother has other ideas.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose thinks her late husband is using inanimate objects to communicate with her from beyond the grave.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's date still lives with his mother; Stan wants Dorothy and Sophia to attend therapy with him.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's Saturday night date causes Rose, Blanche and Sophia to recall scandalous evenings from the past.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose gives the boot to penny-pinching Miles; Blanche loses track of Sophia while Dorothy is vacationing.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier and Niles' spontaneous gesture to share a table with two strangers (Lisa Darr, Megan Mullally) leads to a double date followed by a weekend getaway at a mountain cabin.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A pet parrot disrupts the dinner party Niles hosts for his new neighbors in a ritzy apartment building.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock lies to Kyra when she asks him about his past drug use; Cheyenne makes a confession to Van about her own brush with drugs.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: A counselor encourages all to share their feelings during a workshop; Reba packs Kyra's things to send to Brock's house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Van and Cheyenne go out of town for Van's football game, Reba is upset to find they have asked Barbra Jean to take care of Elizabeth.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van insists on coaching Reba after she agrees to compete against Brock in a 5K race to raise money for Jake's school.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van announces he is quitting school to try out for arena football, but Reba's disapproval causes him to blow his chance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Over Brock and Barbra Jean's objections, Reba gives Kyra permission to go on her first date, then discovers the boy is 17 years old.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Sara prefers to be on the sidelines at work until someone steals her big idea for a Christmas initiative. She makes a wish to Santa to gain the courage to stand up for herself, and he gives her 48 hours to discover how to speak her own mind.

programme.title: Christmas at Castle Hart
programme.desc: Brooke Bennett goes to Ireland during Christmastime to search for her Irish roots. Mistaken for an elite event planner, she's soon hired to host an epic Christmas party at a nobleman's castle.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth choir director must write the title song for the Christmas Eve show, but she becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins her choir unbeknownst to his widowed father, Greg.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci is a once-devout Christian who stopped believing in God after her husband tragically died despite her prayers. As her second Christmas without him approaches, she tries going to a support group for inspiration and comfort.

programme.title: Happy Howlidays
programme.desc: Mia, a meticulous webpage editor for the Seattle Tourism Board, finds herself unexpectedly navigating the holidays alone. As the only one working, she's drawn into an unusual encounter when she encounters a stray dog.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia predicts a hurricane's path; Blanche and Rose participate in a telethon; Dorothy joins Stan in therapy.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dr. Halperin counsels Dorothy at home; a police evacuation forces everyone to take refuge at the TV station.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: While choking, Sophia has an out-of-body experience; Blanche protests the demolition of the family's plantation.

programme.desc: A soldier returning from the Persian Gulf sweeps Blanche off her feet.
